about_the_game:
Note: There are other set products which include this product. Please be aware of duplicate purchases.
The base game is required to use the items in this set. Please make sure you have updated to the latest version.

Obtain three Harpysnare Smoke Beacons, which emit a scent enticing to harpies. When lit in certain locations, harpies within range will flock near. You may be able to grab hold of one and ascend to greater heights.

Note: This consumable item is also obtainable in-game.
This item cannot be gifted to other online players.
After purchase, the content will appear in your in-game storage after staying at an inn. Speak to an innkeeper to view your storage.

Note: There are other set products which include this product. Please be aware of duplicate purchases.

Obtain three Harpysnare Smoke Beacons, which emit a scent enticing to harpies. When lit in certain locations, harpies within range will flock near. You may be able to grab hold of one and ascend to greater heights.

Note: This consumable item is also obtainable in-game.
This item cannot be gifted to other online players.
After purchase, the content will appear in your in-game storage after staying at an inn. Speak to an innkeeper to view your storage.
